reviews.text: We had a welcome reception for a conference here. The venue was extremely nice and the location was fine too. Food was also very good
If you don't want to do a picnic at its front yard, it's better to book for a teatre or music show, in order to get inside.

We visited this establishment because of the Food Markert . Its situated next to Glories. The Food Markert was great ,offered a wide variety of foods ,beer and cakes. It was open to all ages . Started at 11:00 am till late. Nice atmosphere and goof music. However i did not understand why they charged cover charge to enter .

Walked past on the way to glories and thought it looked interesting. Then found out it was totally fenced off and locked with access cards only , this included the beautiful grounds and pathways. This ensures that the person who is outside cannot get in , nor can you access the public paths and walkways ensuring an entire block has zero access. Pompous rear ends comes to mind. Unfortunately it means walkers have to circle the darn building and block to carry on. Do not want your time .
It was in front of my Hotel Melon District, it has a large transparent membrane it helps you to get an idea about its components before visiting it
